items.title: Launch Base
items.desc: I have started a project to create a new kind of startup ecosystem centered around the founders and entrepreneurs. I am building a platform that enables founders to share and validate their ideas, build their companies alongside their customers, and create better customer experiences.

items.title: SideTracked - A personal project
items.desc: A fully featured website that serves as a platform for students across schools to create online communities and share their knowledge about topics that they are passionate about. Check out my website below, and feel free to contact me to implement this in your school!
